animals.name: Lion
animals.facts: Lions are the only cats that live in groups.

animals.name: Elephants
animals.facts: Elephants are the largest land animals on Earth.

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.facts: Giraffes have the same number of neck vertebrae as humans

animals.name: Zebra
animals.facts: No two zebras have the same stripe pattern.
